-e ---

# 𒁻

𒁻 RE7 𒁺 RE6 -er 𒁻 laḫ₄ 𒁺𒁺 laḫ₅ -ler

𒁻 RE7 laḫ₄ /laḫ/ 𒁺𒁺 (laḫ₅)
𒁻 RE7 rex : king

𒁺 RE6 regula regen : walk 𓃀𓂾𒁁 regel (an 𒀭)
𒁺 RE6 kin kühn ĝen gehen ⇔ 𓏱 gone (gün 𒀭)

𒁻 sug₂ scope in 𒁺 gub < kop in 𒅆𒁺 si.gub σκοπέω skopéō "see"

𒁻 sug₂ stand, erect, set up 𒁺 gub

𒁻 su8

imperfective and perfective plural with countable nouns of 𒁺 tum₂ /tum/, “to bring”

𒁻 laḫ₄ -ler in 𒇽𒈲𒁻 lu₂ muš-lah₄ 𒇽𒈲𒁺𒁺 lu₂ muš-laḫ₅ магьосник magjosnik ( russian -nik )

𒁻 •lik ≈ nik in 𒇽 𒈲 𒁻 магьосник magjosnik 𒈲𒁺𒁺𒃲 mega.snake reanalysis

𒁻 •lik in 𒁺 lah₆ ≈ leg 𓂾
